channel.title: ::master command help
channel.description: could some1 give me the command ::masterfor commandpackethandler for 562

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000); } } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Syntax is ::master [id=all]."); } } else if(cmd[0].equals("resetme")) { if (cmd.length == 2) {// u no witch part it is? i never mess with master etc.. player.getSkills().set(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]), 1);// this one is the level id player.getSkills().setXp(Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]), player.getSkills().getXPForLevel(1)); }else{ player.getSkills().reset();

Did you want it for YOU or to GIVE someone else it?

Read full topic
